entities.name: professor binns
entities.description: Professor Binns is mentioned as the one who asked for two rolls of parchment.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as someone who will be in London and has a comment about Percy being Head Boy.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is the one who sent the letter to Harry with a present.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is mentioned as being Head Boy and Ron seems unhappy about it.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who received Hermione's letter and present.

entities.name: hogwarts express
entities.description: Hogwarts Express is mentioned as a place where Harry will see Ron if he can't come to London.

entities.name: london
entities.description: London is the destination that Ron will be in during the last week of holidays.

relationships.description: Ron seems unhappy about Percy being Head Boy.
Hermione sent a present to Harry.
Ron will be in London during the last week of holidays.
Harry will see Ron on the Hogwarts Express if he can't come to London.
